title: The Green Palate Vege-Terranean Grill
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Pizza, International, Organic, Delivery, Take-out, Catering
description: Open May to September months only. A roadside eatery across from the Village Green and next to Clouds Gallery. Its open flame grilling method uses healthy to make a vegan menu inspired by cuisine from the Mediterranean. Serves grilled pizza, veggie burgers, veggie kebobs, salads, daily specials.
